title: Balanced match making/Dynamic queue?
body:
have you guys ever entered a games to play against a full challengers team while you don't even have one single challenger in you team?
it happens a lot!
someone would say:"oh, well, you only lose less than 8 lp, but it offers a chance to play against a great team!"
well, I say:**** that! it happened in my bo3/5!
here is another prof from my friend's game
please riot, how could you call this a reasonable or balanced match making system?

replies.body: Chief Omni is a boosted animal, you should have carried easily.
